name: OMNITOWER (48toPlay2018 Jam)
description:
OMNITOWER a game for the 48 to Play 2018 Gam Jam at Monterrey, México.

Theme: Arco, Dimension y Serindipia. (Bow/Arc, Dimension and Serendipity)

If you think one plane is difficult enough in a Tower Defense game, try with this multidimensional game.
Defend every of the 6 dimension planes using your mana to summon armored units and use your mythical bow. Kill the hordes of week goblins and the powerfull Winged Serpent.
Every time you kill an enemy, you can collect mana crystal to re fill your power.

Instructions
Left Mouse Click - Rotate World
Right Mouse Click - Bow

Team
Marco Elizondo - Developer
Oscar Lopez - Developer and art
Angel Hernandez - Design and art
Rodolfo Aguirre - Music
Carlos Ramos - Art
